sentence: Fox News' Tucker Carlson has all but declared eternal fealty to the Motherland, and Trumpian Mini-Me's like Madison Cawthorn and Marjorie Taylor Greene have decided to give plenty of aid and comfort to their longtime war-criminal crush, but the problem actually runs deeper than that.
title: Missouri radio station continues to air literal Russian war propaganda
